Study: Phenotype of SARS-CoV-2-specific T-cells in COVID-19 patients with acute respiratory distress syndrome
Result of Tool: Spike protein initiates strong T-cell (Th1 cytokine) antigen response

Study: Case fatality rate in COVID-19: a systematic review and meta-analysis
Result of Tool: Elevated LDH/CRP, and fever/dyspnea/hypertension at presentation predict severity

Study: Analysis of adaptive immune cell populations and phenotypes in the patients infected by SARS-CoV-2
Result of Tool: Germinal center B cells and Follicular T helper cells modulate immune responses

Study: COVID-19 infection induces readily detectable morphological and inflammation-related phenotypic changes in peripheral blood monocytes, the severity of which correlate with patient outcome
Result of Tool: CD11b+, CD14+, CD16+, CD68+, CD80+, CD163+, CD206+ monocyte populations secrete IL-6, IL-10 and TNF-alpha, consistent with an inflammatory phenotype

Study: Genomic diversity of SARS-CoV-2 in Coronavirus Disease 2019 patients
Result of Tool: 1-4 intra host genetic variants on average

Study: Candidate targets for immune responses to 2019-Novel Coronavirus (nCoV): sequence homology- and bioinformatic-based predictions
Tool Type: Immune Epitope Database and Analysis Resource (IEDB)
Result of Tool: B and T cell epitopes modulate immune responses

Study: Current Trends in Diagnostics of Viral Infections of Unknown Etiology Viruses
The immune vulnerability landscape of the 2019 Novel Coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2
Result of Tool: B and T cell epitopes (S protein receptor-binding motif) predict immune responses
